Title: Prohibits trustees and members of a board of education from voting on matters before the board which affect a family member of the trustee or board member
Summary: Prohibits trustees and members of a board of education from voting on matters before the board which affect a family member of the trustee or board member who is either employed by the board of education or school district or who would be financially impacted by such vote.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to prohibiting trustees and members of a board of education from voting on matters before the board which affect a family member of the trustee or board member
